content.c_description: With the rise of voice assistants and rich search results, customers have been retrained from searching with keywords to asking for exactly what they want. To control the journey from search engines, apps, maps, and voice assistants to a brand website, marketers need to power answers about their brands everywhere consumers search. Learn how the rise of rich search results, direct answers, and countless third-party experiences is changing digital marketing.
content.yext/name: The Customer Journey Starts with a Question
